item.title: Micro-tutorial: liftM by accident
item.description: As a relatively new Haskeller, I’ve been mystified at the lift family of functions. They idea that they promote a pure function to do some computation in a monad makes sense, but I’ve never found uses for them in my code, and I think it’s because I don’t fully understand them. That changed yesterday, so I hope that my process will help other people in my position come to terms with liftM.
